name: Soop
description:
Made for the UCA Reading Week Game Jam 2022.

Soop, your beloved pet cat, has fallen ill. You need to make a potion that will cure them but! you mustn't drop it.  

Collect the ingredients and brew the potion, before its too late q.q

Controls:

W A S D for movement

E for inventory

F for dialogue

escape to go back to main menu

made by team ADC Support Pre

Tom - artist

Cat - programmer
